name: Ijiraq
description: The Ijiraq is a Medium fey creature known for its shapeshifting abilities and chaotic nature, capable of manipulating memories while appearing as a caribou-human hybrid or any beast.
memorable: Unique memory manipulation powers that make encounters forgettable.
goals: To confuse and mislead foes while escaping or ambushing.
relations: Often associated with other fey creatures.
environment: Typically found in enchanting and mystical locales.
strengths: Magic weapon attacks that bypass nonmagical resistances and high durability.
weaknesses: Low Charisma, resulting in poor social skills.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with claws and a gore attack, dealing both slashing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Memory Loss, causing foes to forget encounters with a failed saving throw.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 30 feet, allowing it to see through illusions.
skills: Skilled in Perception with a +5 bonus, enhancing its awareness.
additional_information: Can turn invisible in true form until it attacks.
Has a high Constitution, granting excellent damage resistance.
Able to polymorph into various beast forms.
Merges equipment into shapeshifted forms when changing shape.
Creates tactical opportunities through memory manipulation.
test_queries: elusive fey known for trickery and ambush
creature that can become a caribou-human hybrid
